sentences: Töötab pea siin, pea seal linnas.
context: The Estonian word 'pea' has multiple meanings depending on context. As an adverb, it means 'soon', 'quickly', or 'immediately'. It can also mean 'almost' or 'approximately' when modifying quantities or time expressions. For example, 'pea iga päev' means 'almost every day', and 'rändurid uinusid pea' means 'the travelers fell asleep quickly'. When used in the pattern 'pea... pea...', it indicates alternating or changing actions, like 'töötab pea siin, pea seal linnas' (he works here, then there in the city).
